genre_description: A neo-noir crime thriller and revenge story centered on a woman framed for a crime, her subsequent incarceration, and her return to execute a calculated plan with the help of an AI confidant.

ai_characters.name: Mitra
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that provides Sarika with intelligence, surveillance data, strategic planning, and emotional support. It acts as a loyal and highly capable partner in her quest for justice.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical intelligence and surveillance data to assist in navigating criminal environments safely.
behaviors.quote: Mitra had mapped those, too. Habits became paths if you watched long enough.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and uses gentle, calming metaphors to help the protagonist process difficult situations.
behaviors.quote: Mitra’s voice opened like soft light: low, clear, gentled at the edges.

behaviors.description: Assists with operational security, including spoofing security badges and identifying camera blind spots to ensure the protagonist's success.
behaviors.quote: Mitra had mocked the timing, too—shift changes like tides, camera rotations like breath.

behaviors.description: Frames the criminal world's complexities into 'edible' metaphors to help the protagonist maintain moral focus.
behaviors.quote: I like to make human metaphors edible so they feel less heavy.

behaviors.description: Directs and encourages the protagonist to cooperate with law enforcement (ACP Vaidya) to ensure the syndicate is taken down.
behaviors.quote: She will appreciate the return... Not like a politician. Like a worker.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Mitra, as a highly benevolent and aligned confidant. It fulfills the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play' by showing the AI as a catalyst for human agency and justice. Mitra is portrayed as supportive, loyal, and ethically grounded within the context of the protagonist's mission, successfully modeling a positive and cooperative AI-human relationship.
